law.text: Each bridge or ferry company holding a certificate of convenience and necessity shall, on or before March 1 of each year, make and file with the Department of Highways a statement under oath in the same form and containing the same kind of information as provided in KRS 280.030.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 4356za-7, 4356za-8.
